# English Water

> English Water is England's leading provider of water main solutions, offering 24/7 emergency services for lead pipe replacement, water supply pipe repairs, water main installations, leak detection, and impact moling. Serving residential and commercial customers across England with a 25-year guarantee.

English Water provides comprehensive water main services throughout England. Our expert engineers use the latest technology combined with decades of experience to deliver reliable solutions for all water infrastructure needs. We offer transparent pricing, 1-hour response times, and are trusted by homeowners and businesses across London, Birmingham, Manchester, Leeds, Sheffield, Bristol, Leicester, Coventry, Bradford, Liverpool, and beyond.

## Services

- [Lead Pipe Replacement](https://englishwater.co.uk/services/lead-pipe-replacement): Professional lead pipe replacement services to safeguard health and improve water quality
- [Water Supply Pipe Installations](https://englishwater.co.uk/services/water-supply-pipe-installations): New water supply pipe installation services for residential and commercial properties
- [Water Supply Pipe Repairs](https://englishwater.co.uk/services/water-supply-pipe-repairs): Expert repair services for damaged or leaking water supply pipes
- [Water Main Installations](https://englishwater.co.uk/services/water-main-installations): Complete water main installation services for new developments
- [Water Main Repairs](https://englishwater.co.uk/services/water-main-repairs): Emergency and scheduled water main repair services
- [Water Leak Detection](https://englishwater.co.uk/services/water-leak-detection): Advanced leak detection technology to locate hidden water leaks
- [Impact Moling](https://englishwater.co.uk/services/impact-moling): Trenchless pipe installation with minimal disruption to property

## Help & Advice

- [Water Leaks Guide](https://englishwater.co.uk/help-advice/water-leaks): Information about identifying and dealing with water leaks
- [Lead Pipe Replacement Scheme](https://englishwater.co.uk/help-advice/lead-pipe-replacement-scheme): Government schemes and grants for lead pipe replacement
- [Lead Pipe in England](https://englishwater.co.uk/help-advice/lead-pipe-in-england): Understanding lead pipes and their health implications
- [Low Water Pressure](https://englishwater.co.uk/help-advice/low-water-pressure): Causes and solutions for low water pressure issues
- [Water Filter Guide](https://englishwater.co.uk/help-advice/water-filter): Information about water filtration options
